questions.question: A law firm wants to automate the extraction of key-value pairs from contracts, identify tabular data, and categorize documents for easier searchability using Amazon Textract. What combination of Textract APIs should they use?
options: Analyze Document API for key-value pairs and tables, Analyze ID API for categorization
Analyze Expenses API for key-value pairs, Analyze ID API for tables, and custom queries for categorization
Analyze Document API for key-value pairs and tables, and custom queries for document categorization
Analyze Document API for forms, Analyze Lending Workflow API for tables, and Analyze Expenses API for categorization
correct_answers: Analyze Document API for key-value pairs and tables, and custom queries for document categorization
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
